please HELP ON CHANGING THE FUCKING LANGUAGE

Yes! I know how to change language! 
1. Download polish language pack (http://www.spolszczenia.pl/gry/program/565 click on the big red button "POBIERZ SPOLSZCZENIE")
2. Unrar WinRar archive
3. Copy INT folder to Binaries/Localization
4. Change name of RUS folder to INT and new INT folder to RUS
5. Launch your game
6. Have fun! ^.^ 

Sorry for my English;)
